revision.text:
{{DISPLAYTITLE:Thing_Move}} {{Special|125|tid, destid, nofog|Thing|Move}}
* ''tid'': tid of the thing to move * ''destid'': tid of the thing to move to * ''nofog'': do not spawn fog
Moves a thing to the location of another thing. If there are multiple things that have the given tids, only the ones with the highest thing numbers will be used. The destination will generally be a map spot or teleporter destination, but it can be anything.
If ''nofog'' is 0, a [[Classes:TeleportFog|teleport flash]] is spawned at the source and destination spot.
